title: Paid my 55.00 chargeback via paypal. Riot sends me this email telling me its unlocked. Still Locked
body:
I have several accounts and I think it might be a mix up on there account. Ive played since closed beta. This account has had a 55.00 chargeback on it for sometime now. I paid that via paypal and riot sent me this email

Greetings Summoner
We just received a repayment of 55.00 USD for the following account:

Region: North America
User Name: poconoes

You have now cleared all of your outstanding balance and your account has been unlocked.

For reference, your payment ID is b16d9f8f-2500-46ed-96a8-*(Didn't know if this was important or not)

Please note that any future chargebacks may result in your account being permanently locked.

Yet, Its still Locked.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
